features: B-Rad Strap and Accessory mount consists of a Toughtek® Grip fabric strap with an EVA foam pad and a mounting plate
Strap down multitools, CO2, tubes, jackets, bags, etc. directly on your frame
Securely straps items with a diameter up to 60mm (Mini), 80mm (Regular) or 120mm (XL)
Requires the use of a B-Rad base mount or Double Bottle adapter
Mini strap is also compatible with the Half-Bottle adapter.
